description: There are no fancy features, but if you want those you already have a favorite terminal emulator. Gets the job done, nothing more. But you're on GNOME, so you probably aren't living in the terminal anyway.
summary: Does what it sets out to

description: It is a very good console application but it can be developed more such as profiles, more customizations and themes. I like it!
Sadly. It even looks more limited than the GTK3 sibling - why not just update that one rather than renaming & rebranding it?
Amazing for simple use. No unnecessary extra staff.
follows gnome latest design guidelines. gives me everything i want in a very minimilastic way...
Simple and easy to use, integrates well with the GNOME desktop and functions very well. Would recommend over gnome-terminal if you are using GNOME.
Nice, unfinished tho. 1. weird process name: kgx. 2. No man entry. 3. No way to --execute a command through it.
For basic use, this terminal emulator it's very good. The integration with GNOME is the best in class and the ui looks clean and fresh. I cannot wait for the libadwaita version =)

I only use the terminal when I know it's faster or I have to use a command line tool. This is a great terminal app for users like me, as it is cut down to the bare-bones essence of what a terminal should be: a window to interact with your computer through the command line. However, if you spend a lot of the time in your terminal and want extra quality of life / comfort features, you might want to use a more feature-rich terminal application.

Consola pretende reemplazar en un futuro a Terminal de Gnome. Estoy usando Consola en su versión 43 y aún es extremadamente sencilla, espero siga mejorando. De todas maneras me ha funcionado muy bien.
no puedo trabajar, estoy agregando un disco de 500Gb para poder disfrutar de UBUNTU
summary: disfrutar de UBUNTU con disco de 500 GB

description: Очень понравилось. Стилистически выдержанное, при руте цвет заголовка говорит об этом.
